fr_FR.description: Cette conversion permet de jouer à IWD1 et IWD2 depuis Enhanced Edition Trilogy.

components.choice_0: Icewind Dale: Heart of Winter in Baldur's Gate Enhanced Edition Trilogy
components.2: Special : Icewind Dale MOVIES IN Russian WITH Russian VOICES
components.3: Special : Icewind Dale MOVIES IN Russian WITH English VOICES
components.1: Icewind Dale: Heart of Winter in Baldur's Gate Enhanced Edition Trilogy
